title.rendered: Grow Your Business with Dionne Phillips of D’Lashes | TomGirl Ep. 49

content.rendered:
Happy August! I’m so honored and excited to be featured on AfterBuzz TV talking about all things lashes, business, and entrepreneurship!

Show Notes: Dionne Phillips is the pioneer of eyelash extensions, founder of D’Lashes and has been making A-List celebrities’ eyes pop for years. The entrepreneur sits down with TomGirl host J.J. Jurgens to share her tips on how you can lash out and grow your own successful business empire.

Check out the video above for business tips and all things lashes. If you don’t see the video click on the link below to watch it on Youtube.

D’Lashes on AfterBuzz TV. Click here to watch!

LOVE DIONNE
